steps.title: How are you feeling this morning?
steps.details: Let's start the day with a quick check-in. Your answer will tailor the next few steps.

steps.title: 2-Minute Wake Up Routine
steps.details: First, drink a glass of water. Then, press start for a quick, gentle stretch to wake up your body. Focus on your movement.

steps.title: 1-Minute Calming Breath
steps.details:
Let's calm your mind with a simple box breathing exercise. 

Inhale for 4 seconds.
Hold for 4 seconds.
Exhale for 4 seconds.
Hold for 4 seconds.

Press start and follow this rhythm.

steps.title: Set Today's Intention
steps.details: Before diving into tasks, let's set a positive tone for the day.
steps.prompt: What is one thing you are grateful for, and what is your primary focus for today?

steps.title: Review Your Priorities
steps.details: Now that you're centered, it's time to look at your day. We'll open your calendar so you can identify your most important tasks.

steps.title: You're Ready!
steps.details: You've started your day with intention and clarity. Go make it a great one!
